start.title: A Dark Forest
start.text: You wake up in a dark forest. Mist curls between the ancient trees. Two paths lie ahead.

left.title: Abandoned Cabin
left.text: You find an abandoned cabin. A faint light flickers inside.

right.title: Rushing River
right.text: A rushing river blocks the path. A rickety bridge sways in the wind.

enter.title: Warm Hearth
enter.text: Inside, a friendly fire and a warm stew await. You are safe... for now.

cross.title: On the Other Side
cross.text: You safely cross and find a small village. The adventure continues elsewhere.

end.title: The End
end.text: Thank you for playing this demo.
